subject: Sales
title: Navigating Price Discussions
description: A quick, practical guide to Navigating Price Discussions.

hook.text: The buyer asks 'Can you do better on price?' Your next five seconds determine the entire deal.

buildup.text: Price conversations trigger anxiety on both sides. Buyers fear overpaying. Sellers fear lost margins.

discovery.text: Shift from price to value: 'What's this problem costing you today?' reframes the entire equation.

twist.text: Instant discounting signals weakness. It tells the buyer the original price was never real.

climax.text: Hold your price confidently but show flexibility on terms, scope, or timeline. Value stays intact.

punchline.text: Don't drop the price. Reframe the value.

quiz.question: Why is immediate discounting a bad strategy?
options: It signals the original price was inflated and trains objection behavior
